Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Mononegavirales Infections/Paramyxoviridae Infections/Morbillivirus Infections/Rinderpest
Record.Description: A viral disease of cloven-hoofed animals caused by MORBILLIVIRUS. It may be acute, subacute, or chronic with the major lesions characterized by inflammation and ulceration of the entire digestive tract.
